typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		tem_key as string,
		tem_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select tem_key, tem_description  from dwh_prepare.pre_dim_claim_team',
	format: 'query') ~> MPreDimClaimTeam
Constants alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(tem_key))) ~> AlterRow1
MPreDimClaimTeam aggregate(groupBy(tem_key),
	each(match(name!='tem_key'), $$ = first($$))) ~> deduplicator
deduplicator derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Claim Teams') ~> Constants
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		tem_key as string,
		tem_description as string,
		tem_id as long,
		top_id as long,
		top_key as string,
		top_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['tem_key'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		tem_key,
		tem_description,
		top_key,
		top_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimClaimTeam
